description: Analyzed leads ready for outreach - output from analysis engine

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique lead ID

columns.name: prospect_id
columns.description: Foreign key to prospects table

columns.name: company_name
columns.description: Company/business name

columns.name: industry
columns.description: Industry type (restaurant, dentist, law-firm, etc.)

columns.name: url
columns.description: Website URL

columns.name: city
columns.description: Business city/location

columns.name: state
columns.description: Business state (NY, CA, etc.)

columns.name: contact_email
columns.description: Contact email (extracted from website or enriched)

columns.name: contact_phone
columns.description: Contact phone (extracted from website)

columns.name: contact_name
columns.description: Contact person name (if available)

columns.name: website_grade
columns.description: Letter grade A-F

columns.name: overall_score
columns.description: Overall score 0-100

columns.name: design_score
columns.description: Design analysis score 0-100 (legacy - use design_score_desktop/mobile for new records)

columns.name: design_score_desktop
columns.description: Desktop design analysis score 0-100

columns.name: design_score_mobile
columns.description: Mobile design analysis score 0-100

columns.name: seo_score
columns.description: SEO analysis score 0-100

columns.name: content_score
columns.description: Content analysis score 0-100

columns.name: social_score
columns.description: Social media analysis score 0-100

columns.name: accessibility_score
columns.description: Accessibility/WCAG compliance score 0-100

columns.name: weights
columns.description: AI-calculated dimension weights used for grading (e.g., {design: 0.30, seo: 0.25, ...})

columns.name: weight_reasoning
columns.description: AI-generated explanation for weight selection based on industry and business context

columns.name: design_issues
columns.description: Array of design issues found (legacy - use design_issues_desktop/mobile for new records)

columns.name: design_issues_desktop
columns.description: Array of desktop-specific design issues

columns.name: design_issues_mobile
columns.description: Array of mobile-specific design issues

columns.name: mobile_critical_issues
columns.description: Count of high-priority mobile design issues

columns.name: desktop_critical_issues
columns.description: Count of high-priority desktop design issues

columns.name: seo_analysis_model
columns.description: AI model used for SEO analysis (e.g., grok-4-fast)

columns.name: content_analysis_model
columns.description: AI model used for content analysis (e.g., grok-4-fast)

columns.name: desktop_visual_model
columns.description: AI model used for desktop visual analysis (e.g., gpt-4o)

columns.name: mobile_visual_model
columns.description: AI model used for mobile visual analysis (e.g., gpt-4o)

columns.name: social_analysis_model
columns.description: AI model used for social media analysis (e.g., grok-4-fast)

columns.name: accessibility_analysis_model
columns.description: AI model used for accessibility analysis (e.g., grok-4-fast)

columns.name: seo_issues
columns.description: Array of SEO issues found

columns.name: content_issues
columns.description: Array of content issues found

columns.name: social_issues
columns.description: Array of social media issues found

columns.name: accessibility_issues
columns.description: Array of WCAG accessibility violations found

columns.name: accessibility_compliance
columns.description: WCAG 2.1 compliance details from accessibility analyzer (violations by level, compliance percentage, etc.)

columns.name: accessibility_wcag_level
columns.description: WCAG 2.1 compliance level (A, AA, or AAA)

columns.name: performance_metrics_pagespeed
columns.description: PageSpeed Insights data (mobile + desktop metrics, Core Web Vitals, opportunities)

columns.name: performance_metrics_crux
columns.description: Chrome UX Report data (real user metrics from Chrome browsers)

columns.name: performance_issues
columns.description: Performance issues generated from PageSpeed + CrUX data

columns.name: performance_score_mobile
columns.description: PageSpeed Insights mobile performance score (0-100)

columns.name: performance_score_desktop
columns.description: PageSpeed Insights desktop performance score (0-100)

columns.name: performance_api_errors
columns.description: Any errors from performance API calls

columns.name: quick_wins
columns.description: Array of quick-win opportunities

columns.name: analysis_summary
columns.description: Human-readable analysis summary (for email)

columns.name: top_issue
columns.description: Most critical issue (for outreach hook)

columns.name: one_liner
columns.description: One-line critique for email subject/preview

columns.name: call_to_action
columns.description: Suggested CTA for outreach email

columns.name: outreach_angle
columns.description: Sales/outreach angle based on grade (e.g., 'Site is actively hurting business - immediate action needed')

columns.name: tech_stack
columns.description: Detected technology stack (WordPress, Shopify, etc.)

columns.name: page_load_time
columns.description: Page load time in milliseconds

columns.name: is_mobile_friendly
columns.description: Is the site mobile-friendly?

columns.name: has_https
columns.description: Does the site use HTTPS?

columns.name: screenshot_desktop_url
columns.description: Local file path to desktop screenshot

columns.name: screenshot_mobile_url
columns.description: Local file path to mobile screenshot

columns.name: screenshots_manifest
columns.description: Complete screenshot manifest with storage paths, URLs, and metadata for all crawled pages (homepage + multi-page). Structure: { storage_type, base_url, pages: { '/': { desktop: {url, width, height, size}, mobile: {...} }, '/about': {...} }, total_screenshots, lead_id }

columns.name: design_tokens_desktop
columns.description: Extracted design tokens from desktop viewport (fonts with families/sizes/weights/usage, colors with hex/usage, sorted by frequency)

columns.name: design_tokens_mobile
columns.description: Extracted design tokens from mobile viewport (fonts with families/sizes/weights/usage, colors with hex/usage, sorted by frequency)

columns.name: social_profiles
columns.description: Social media profile URLs

columns.name: social_platforms_present
columns.description: Array of social platforms found

columns.name: social_metadata
columns.description: Social media metadata and engagement data

columns.name: has_blog
columns.description: Does the site have a blog?

columns.name: content_insights
columns.description: Content analysis insights and recommendations

columns.name: page_title
columns.description: Page title tag

columns.name: meta_description
columns.description: Meta description tag

columns.name: status
columns.description: Lead status in outreach pipeline

columns.name: lead_priority
columns.description: AI-scored lead quality/priority (0-100, higher = better)

columns.name: lead_priority_reasoning
columns.description: AI-generated explanation for the priority score

columns.name: priority_tier
columns.description: Categorical priority tier - hot: 75-100, warm: 50-74, cold: 0-49

columns.name: budget_likelihood
columns.description: Estimated budget capacity based on business signals

columns.name: fit_score
columns.description: How well the prospect fits the Ideal Customer Profile (0-100)

columns.name: benchmark_tier
columns.description: Benchmark tier classification - aspirational: top performers (A+), competitive: solid performers (A-B), baseline: average performers (C+)

columns.name: quality_gap_score
columns.description: Quality gap dimension score (0-25) - how much improvement potential exists

columns.name: budget_score
columns.description: Budget dimension score (0-25) - estimated budget capacity

columns.name: urgency_score
columns.description: Urgency dimension score (0-20) - how urgently they need help

columns.name: industry_fit_score
columns.description: Industry fit dimension score (0-15) - how well they match target industry

columns.name: company_size_score
columns.description: Company size dimension score (0-10) - company size assessment

columns.name: engagement_score
columns.description: Engagement dimension score (0-5) - social media engagement level

columns.name: business_intelligence
columns.description: Extracted business intelligence data (years in business, employee count, pricing, decision makers, etc.)

columns.name: crawl_metadata
columns.description: Multi-page crawl metadata (pages crawled, links found, crawl time, failed pages)

columns.name: project_id
columns.description: Associated project ID - every lead must belong to a project

columns.name: matched_benchmark_id
columns.description: Foreign key to benchmarks table - the benchmark company used for comparison

columns.name: pages_discovered
columns.description: Total pages discovered in sitemap (intelligent analysis system)

columns.name: pages_crawled
columns.description: Number of pages actually crawled with screenshots (intelligent analysis)

columns.name: pages_analyzed
columns.description: Number of pages that received AI analysis (intelligent analysis)

columns.name: ai_page_selection
columns.description: AI's page selection decisions and reasoning (which pages for which modules)

columns.name: analyzed_at
columns.description: When the analysis was performed

columns.name: analysis_cost
columns.description: Cost of analysis in USD

columns.name: analysis_time
columns.description: Analysis time in milliseconds

columns.name: discovery_log
columns.description: Complete discovery and analysis log with all pages found, AI reasoning, errors, and critical findings

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Record creation timestamp

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Record last update timestamp

constraints.name: chk_design_score_desktop_range
constraints.expression: design_score_desktop IS NULL OR (design_score_desktop >= 0 AND design_score_desktop <= 100)

constraints.name: chk_design_score_mobile_range
constraints.expression: design_score_mobile IS NULL OR (design_score_mobile >= 0 AND design_score_mobile <= 100)

constraints.name: chk_performance_score_mobile_range
constraints.expression: performance_score_mobile IS NULL OR (performance_score_mobile >= 0 AND performance_score_mobile <= 100)

constraints.name: chk_performance_score_desktop_range
constraints.expression: performance_score_desktop IS NULL OR (performance_score_desktop >= 0 AND performance_score_desktop <= 100)

constraints.name: chk_lead_priority_range
constraints.expression: lead_priority IS NULL OR (lead_priority >= 0 AND lead_priority <= 100)

constraints.name: chk_fit_score_range
constraints.expression: fit_score IS NULL OR (fit_score >= 0 AND fit_score <= 100)
